title: GIVEAWAY: Enter the Biggest Cycling Giveaway Ever
content:
This is it: One massive giveaway. One very lucky person will win two framesets and a haul of accessories for a combined value north of $24,000!

The Biggest Cycling Giveaway Ever is a collaborative giveaway from nearly two dozen cycling brands, including Ritte, Transition MTB, Lead Out!, Cane Creek, Hunt, SRAM, Kogel, Attaquer, Wolf Tooth, 1UP, Knog, Hiplock, Wahoo, Skratch, Continental, Tons, Feedback, USA Cycling, RideWrap, VIAIR, Abbey Bike Tools, CORE, Bivo, BikeRumor, ESI, and Gemini.

These brands came together around the premise of N+1, as cyclists are always looking for the next step in upgrading their rides. Here you’ll find two new bikes, key accessories like tires and cassettes, tools, as well as ways to improve your lighting, training, and security, all with stylish flair.

The giveaway runs through March 26 (PST) and the winner will be announced via email on March 30.

The itemized list of gear included in the giveaway is below. How do you win it all? Just enter here:

Enter the Biggest Cycling Giveaway Ever

More on the Prize Package

The Biggest Cycling Giveaway Ever prize package includes:

Ritte: Custom Titanium road or gravel frameset
Transition: Spur mountain bike frameset
SRAM: Force AXS Xplr groupset
Cane Creek: eeWing Ti Cranks, Helm front suspension fork, and Air IL rear suspension
HUNT: 42 Limitless Gravel Adventure wheels and HUNT XC Wide wheels
Kogel: Ceramic oversized derailleur cage and bottom brackets for both bikes
Attaquer: $1,000 USD clothing credit
Wolf Tooth: Resolve Dropper Post with remote and echo grips for the MTB. Seatpost clamp and handlebar tape for the Ritte. Headsets, chainrings, color kits, bar end plugs, and titanium bottle cages for both bikes
Lead Out!: Racelite Handlebar Bag, Zip Saddle Bag, Mini Frame Bag, Bottles, Essential Socks, and a Tech Tee
1UP: Silver Heavy Duty Double Rack
Wahoo: ROAM Bundle
Knog: Blinder 1300 front bike light, Mid Cobber rear light, Blinder X 2300 front light, Blinder X rear light, and two Scout bike alarms and finder
USA Cycling: Race+ Membership, Custom Cuore USA Cycling Kit (Jersey, Bibs, Socks—Mountain or Road)
Hiplok: Airlok and D1000 bike locks
Feedback Sports: Pro Mechanic Repair Stand and a Reflex Fixed T
ESI: grips
Gemini: carbon fiber parts
